meanings.definition: The act of burying a dead body again in a different location.
meanings.sent1: The reburials of ancient kings were done with great care.
meanings.sent2: After the archaeological dig, the reburials took place in a sacred site.
meanings.sent3: The reburials of the pirate crew turned into a treasure hunt for the villagers.
meanings.sent4: The reburials of memories in her mind brought closure to the past.
meanings.sent5: The reburials under the old oak tree were a solemn ceremony.

meanings.definition: The process of reburying human remains.
meanings.sent1: The reburials after the war were a somber task for the soldiers.
meanings.sent2: In some cultures, reburials are part of honoring the ancestors.
meanings.sent3: The reburials of the ancient mummy became a tourist attraction.
meanings.sent4: The reburials of history books in the library symbolized preservation.
meanings.sent5: The reburials in the family plot marked the end of a chapter.
